# fly_ip (Resource)

Fly ip resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app` (String) The App this resource will be created in
- `type` (String) `v4` or `v6`

### Optional

- `region` (String) Fly region, ex `ord`, `sin`, `mad`

### Read-Only

- `address` (String)
- `id` (String) A fly-generated ID
